149.91 lbs. 		Ghoul Pokémon A ghoul with a propensity for slashing. Its blurred shape allows it to move at unpredictable speeds, enabling it to catch prey off-guard.

Ability Learnset

By leveling up

Level Ability Cost Description
1 Clear Body 52 Prevents other Pokémon's moves or Abilities from lowering the Pokémon's stats.
1 Shadow Tag 73 This Pokémon steps on the opposing Pokémon's shadow to prevent it from escaping.
18 Hyper Cutter 12 The Pokémon's pride of its pincers prevents other Pokémon from lowering its Attack stat.
36 Wispy Form 27 The Pokémon creates a eerie fog when it's hit by an attack.
54 Fog Veil 11 Boosts the Pokémon's evasiveness in eerie fog.
72 Sharpness 56 Boosts the power of slicing moves.
90 Cloud Nine 27 Eliminates the effects of weather.
100 Technician 59 Powers up the Pokémon's weaker moves.
  • Bold indicates a default ability if multiple abilities are disabled
  • Italic indicates hidden ability if multiple abilities are disabled

By Disc

Disc Ability Cost Description
Disc 03 Own Tempo 2 This Pokémon has its own tempo, and that prevents it from becoming confused.
Disc 04 Insomnia 10 The Pokémon is suffering from insomnia and cannot fall asleep.
Disc 08 Trace 11 When it enters a battle, the Pokémon copies an opposing Pokémon's Ability.
Disc 13 Cloud Nine 27 Eliminates the effects of weather.
Disc 16 Lifelink 8 The Pokémon recovers some HP when it deals damage.
Disc 18 Mimicry 12 Changes the Pokémon's type depending on the terrain.
Disc 23 Shadow Tag 73 This Pokémon steps on the opposing Pokémon's shadow to prevent it from escaping.
Disc 26 Super Luck 53 The Pokémon is so lucky that the critical-hit ratios of its moves are boosted.
Disc 46 Fog Veil 11 Boosts the Pokémon's evasiveness in eerie fog.
Disc 53 Arena Lock 11 Negates statuses that affect the whole field.
  • Bold indicates a default ability if multiple abilities are disabled
  • Italic indicates hidden ability if multiple abilities are disabled

By tutoring

Ability Cost Description
Adaptability 60 Powers up moves of the same type as the Pokémon.
Anticipation 1 The Pokémon can sense an opposing Pokémon's dangerous moves.
Beast Boost 59 The Pokémon boosts its most proficient stat each time it knocks out a Pokémon.
Berserk 30 Boosts its Sp. Atk stat when it takes a hit that causes its HP to become half or less.
Clear Body 52 Prevents other Pokémon's moves or Abilities from lowering the Pokémon's stats.
Contrary 72 Makes stat changes have an opposite effect.
Cursed Body 11 May disable a move used on the Pokémon.
Dark Aura 28 Powers up each Pokémon's Dark-type moves.
Emergency Exit -21 The Pokémon, sensing danger, switches out when its HP becomes half or less.
Fluffy 28 Halves the damage taken from contact moves, but doubles that of Fire-type moves.
Fog Warning 75 The Pokémon creates an eerie fog upon entering battle.
Frisk 1 When it enters a battle, the Pokémon can check an opposing Pokémon's held item.
High Entropy 27 Boosts the Pokémon's Evasiveness under Gravity.
Hustle 29 Boosts the Attack stat, but lowers accuracy.
Hyper Cutter 12 The Pokémon's pride of its pincers prevents other Pokémon from lowering its Attack stat.
Immoralize 68 Normal-type moves become Dark-type moves. Their power is boosted a little.
Infiltrator 27 Passes through the opposing Pokémon's barrier, substitute, and the like and strikes.
Inner Focus 11 The Pokémon's intensely focused, and that protects the Pokémon from flinching.
Intrepid Sword 72 Boosts the Pokémon's Attack stat when the Pokémon enters a battle.
Klutz -39 The Pokémon can't use any held items.
Limber 10 Its limber body protects the Pokémon from paralysis.
Lithe Form 54 Boosts the Pokémon's Speed stat on Combat Terrain.
Misty Mane 11 Boosts the Pokémon's Defensive stats on Misty Terrain.
Mold Breaker 40 Moves can be used on the target regardless of its Abilities.
Morbid Mania 28 Boosts the Pokémon's Speed stat on Morbid Terrain.
Morbid Surge 75 Turns the ground into Morbid Terrain when the Pokémon enters a battle.
Moxie 59 The Pokémon shows moxie, and that boosts the Attack stat after knocking out any Pokémon.
No Guard 55 The Pokémon employs no-guard tactics to ensure incoming and outgoing attacks always land.
Pressure 28 By putting pressure on the opposing Pokémon, it raises their PP usage.
Run Away 0 Enables a sure getaway from wild Pokémon.
Screen Cleaner 12 Entering a battle nullifies the effects of Light Screen, Reflect, and Aurora Veil.
Shadow Shield 69 Reduces the amount of damage the Pokémon takes while its HP is full.
Sharpness 56 Boosts the power of slicing moves.
Slow Start -75 For five turns, the Pokémon's Attack and Speed stats are halved.
Stakeout 28 Doubles the damage dealt to the target's replacement if the target switches out.
Stall -27 The Pokémon moves after all other Pokémon do.
Steadfast 11 The Pokémon's determination boosts the Speed stat each time the Pokémon flinches.
Technician 59 Powers up the Pokémon's weaker moves.
Telepathy 59 Anticipates an ally's attack and dodges it.
Terrorize 68 Normal-type moves become Ghost-type moves. Their power is boosted a little.
Truant -74 The Pokémon can't use a move if it had used a move on the previous turn.
Unearthly 254 The Pokémon generates a bizarre area that swaps Attack stats when it enters battle.
Unnerve 2 Unnerves opposing Pokémon and makes them unable to eat Berries.
Unstable Isotope 27 Boosts the Pokémon's Defensive stats under Gravity.
Wispy Form 27 The Pokémon creates a eerie fog when it's hit by an attack.
  • Bold indicates a default ability if multiple abilities are disabled
  • Italic indicates hidden ability if multiple abilities are disabled
